page.title: 15A WALK IN THE ROWSLEY AREA
page.content:
A WALK IN THE ROWSLEY AREA
WE ARE DOING A DOMESDAY SURVEY FOR A BLOCK IN THIS AREA.THE BLOCK IS 4KM BY 3KM.IT HAS CHATSWORTH PARK IN IT AS WELL.WE WALKED MOST OF THE WAY ROUND IT.THERE IS A VILLAGE WITH THE NAME BEELEY,WE STARTED BY THE CORNER SHOP IN ROWSLEY .THERE ARE NOT VERY MANY HOUSES IN THE AREA.OUR BLOCK IS MORE MOOR LAND AND DARK WOODS,OPEN FIELDS THAN FACTORIES AND SHOPS . THE BLOCK IS NOT VERY FAR AWAY FROM THE SCHOOL.THERE IS A RIVER THAT RUNS THOUGH THE BLOCK,THE NAME OF IT IS IS THE RIVER DERWENT.
